statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ 2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 9 \\ 0 \\ -18 \\ 6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 6 \\ 14 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -23 \\ 12 \\ 70 \\ -18 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
